name: Bartok - Pets And Cute Animals
description:
Classic card game Bartok. Play to unlock images. Or use the built-in card editor to make your own cards using your own pics. You can then export your card game and share it.

If you like this game, get the PC version here: (it is better then the web version and it is free)

https://peter-apoguy.itch.io/bartok-free

If you would like to make your own levels, get this game with a level editor:

https://peter-apoguy.itch.io/bartok
